name: 974APPS (demo online www.974apps.com)
short_description:
With DBSConnector kernel (DataBase Server Connector), 974 Application Server allow you to connect in all your networks, all your sql/nosql databases (from different supplier) as if you had a single database, in an oriented architecture environment ... 200000 lines of code and configuration files.

974 Application Server helps with development of your business process and powerful Web applications emphasizing security and clustered load balancing which you can rapidly redistribute on the same cluster to other customers. Our server is free and 100% JAVA.
